Package slogo.compiler

Class Compiler

java.lang.Object
slogo.compiler.Compiler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputObserver
public class Compiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputObserver
Responsible for grouping tokens into a form in which they could be run. Detects beginning and end of lists, and creates SLogoList tokens. All tokens in the current Parser session will be used to create a SLogoFunction, which the compiler will run once the parser queue is depleted. Upon encountering a SLogoComment token, the compiler will ignore all subsequent tokens until the next new line character.

  • Method Details

    • makeTokenQueue

      private void makeTokenQueue​(java.lang.String input)
      Uses the parser to create a Queue of SLogoToken instances from the user input string.
      Parameters:
      input - user input to the console

    • compileAndRun

      public SLogoToken compileAndRun​(java.lang.String input)
      Creates a SLogoFunction object containing all compiled SLogoToken objects. This will add lists as SLogoList objects rather than as individual tokens, therefore these lists should be treated link single tokens. Upon successful creation of the SLogoFunction object, this method will call the function's run() method.

    • getNextToken

      private SLogoToken getNextToken()
      Returns the next SLogoToken from the queue of parsed tokens. Returns null if no more tokens are available.
      Returns:
      a SLogoToken object or null.

    • hasNextToken

      private boolean hasNextToken()
      Determines whether there are more tokens left in this compile session.
      Returns:
      boolean whether there are more parsed SLogoTokens.

    • makeList

      private SLogoList makeList() throws SLogoException
      This method should only be called when a SLogoListStart token is encountered. This method creates a SLogoList token with all subsequent tokens in the queue until it encounters a SLogoListEnd.
      Returns:
      a SLogoList object.
      Throws:
      SLogoException

    • makeGroupFunction

      private SLogoFunction makeGroupFunction() throws SLogoException
      Throws:
      SLogoException

    • receiveUserInput

      public void receiveUserInput​(java.lang.String input)
